sub-element.description: Sub-element classification of a specific type of element within a given element class.

element.description: Classification of the specific element of intererst within the group.

group.description: Sub-group classification of the major grouping, e.g., 'Super Structure', 'Exterior Enclosure', and 'Roofing' are groups within the major group 'Shell'.

major_group_id.description: 1-digit alphabetical indentifier of the major group.

major_group.description: Classification of major portion of the building this particular component fits into. Classified into six discrete categories: <'Substructure', 'Shell', 'Interiors', 'Services', 'Equipment and Furnishings', 'Special Construction & Demolition'>.
